website_summaries.verdict: Great for kids of all ages, especially those who love stars or who want a unique nightlight.
pros: Star projector has several different color options
Can connect to iPhone, iPod, Android, MP3 player, or computer
Includes white noise with adjustable volume
Auto shut off options of 30 minutes, 60 minutes, or nonstop
cons: You can't use the overnight sounds and the alarm at the same time or else the alarm won't go off

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn near perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn near perfect. I had bought another light & sound machine but had to return it. This is far more superior. It is great because it has time and temp, plus you can change the sound to go off in 30 or 60 minutes, or continuous play. It is also great that it comes with an AC adapter or you can use batteries for trips. Some of the sounds are weird, and you cant layer them, but my mom friend recommended it and it is definitely a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Golden_Sol

customer_reviews.title: Great light feature but do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the light feature. It illuminates the room just enough and has a wide range that puts stars on ceiling and walls. However it has an alarm feature that will randomly go off which woke my kids on several occasions! Nothing in instruction booklet to help figure out why. The alarm would just randomly go off. Thought maybe it was a defect so I got another one because my son lived the stars only to discover after months of use it started to do same thing with the alarm. Oh and if power goes out the battery backup does not automatically keep it on. You have to manually turn it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how cheap this seemed when I pulled it out of the packaging. Considering that this is not a cheap projector/noise machine, I was surprised by the cheapness but was willing to overlook it. Before placing it in my son's room, I plugged it in so I could see how it works. The bulb for the projector immediately blew out. Considering the bulbs are not replaceable, I sent this right back to Amazon and won't repurchase this same machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Koivu

customer_reviews.title: Limited Function
customer_reviews.text: You cannot differentiate between the alarm sound/volume settings and the alarm sound/settings. You can either have it soothing and quiet for sleep, or alerting and loud for morning, but not both! What an awful design.
customer_reviews.author: Elihu

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: We got this purely for the star projector because we can set it to stay on. We had another product which had a perfect star projector but it would shut off after some time and my kid kept waking up to go turn it back on. We tried some others that would not turn off but the star projectors were horrible or too bright, etc. This one is very similar to our kid's old turtle and it can be set to stay on all night. We haven't tried any other functions so no idea how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! My husband has a hard time with the buttons being so close together because his fingers are larger than mine. I just tell him to use a pencil eraser. LoL Our daughter has been afraid of the dark since birth. This is a great night light for her. She loves the stars and the sound of the rain. I love that it has a clock on it so she knows if it's an ok time to get out of bed in the morning and wake me up. LoL never too early like 6:00am. Also has an alarm so when she starts kindergarten she's ready for her wake up call.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cheap, tiny little over priced piece of junk. We returned it. Everything is terrible...the star display is barely visible, you can’t find the tiny buttons to operate the alarm...and especially turn it off when half asleep. The display doesn’t light in the dark, unless you fumble around in the dark for the back light button which only lights for a few seconds. Save your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: We chose this product for its combo of settings, but it isn't perfect. 1) You can select only one sound--that sound is used both then for the sound machine and for the alarm. My daughter would like to go to sleep listening to the waves, but the waves are not effective at waking her up in the morning.... 2) Even when you set the lights are set to "continuously", they turn off after an hour, so we cannot use this as a night light. 3) Several of the sounds are annoying/unpleasant 4) the clock is not back-lit, so you cannot easily read it in the dark. 5) there is no snooze button
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: This ligts, sounds and clock was everything I had hoped for. I have twins and one has recently began waking several times during the night. The one waking and crying wakes the other which left me sleepless. We have used it now for several nights and both kiddos have slept (or at least settled themselves back to sleep) through the night which has allowed me to sleep. They like the various colors and the ocean sounds. I may purchase a second one as a back up should anything happen to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money & False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple months. Will just randomly shut off and we have to keep turning it back on. Now I'm outside the return window, so what a waste of money. I have tried to reach out to the seller three times since the listing states "★ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ★ If you are not completely satisfied, we will give your money back NO QUESTIONS ASKED!" and "We are so certain of your satisfaction that we offer a ONE-YEAR 100% money back guarantee! No questions asked! Click ADD-TO-CART to order your GalaxyClock Star Projector today RISK-FREE!" This is apparently false advertising as every attempt to contact the seller has gone unanswered.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Plug doesn’t work on the 2 we tried, not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a shame this product doesn’t work because my daughter loves it. But the first one we had only worked one night then the next night is shut off after a few minutes. Returned it and got another and the replacement only lasted 5 minutes when it shut off. Works fine off batteries but my daughter liked it on all night so we would just eat through the batteries. The plug is the clearly the issue but if you’re going to charge $35 for an item, spring for a plug that actually works. Very disappointed I would definitely NOT recommend buying it, not for the price they are charging.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: He got this for his 5th birthday and it's amazing! We even brought it with us camping and ...
customer_reviews.text: This totally needs to be equipped with a plug in option but either way, it's a total WIN! I wish I had found this when my son was a baby. He got this for his 5th birthday and it's amazing! We even brought it with us camping and trust me, our tent was the coolest tent ever with starry ambience glowing inside and can be seen from the outside. This is cool enough for grown-ups. The sounds a great and alarm works great.. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: forester

customer_reviews.title: ours has always been glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2/2019. Within a couple of months it became glitchy. I just thought it was my children and user error, till it started shutting off after just a few minutes after I turned it on. I wish there was some longevity to this device as it was not used often, however it did not even last 18 months.. It was really bright for a night light as well. we had to tuck in the back of an open shelf to hide a lot of the light so my son wouldn't be kept awake. Had I paid more attention, I would have reached out to the company for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our two year old granddaughter. Easy to use, set up etc. the sounds are calming too. I do like the volume control. The only suggestion/critique is the changing colors. It would be nice to have the option of constant vs changing. This is just my preference and a minor concern. Would recommend. Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Family Favourite, worth the expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was everyone's favourite, until the dome cracked. By everyone, I mean the toddlers & preschoolers who nap here, and the 20 something and teenager who share a bedroom. The lights add a nice touch of just enough soothing light. All the sound options came in handy. The alarm was a life saver (for the teen). Batteries do need replacing often if it gets daily use, but well worth that and the full price of the item, which I had balked at at first.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids night light alarm with deep sounds.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I was looking for!!! My daughter loves it!!! She specifically wanted a clock and alarm, nature sounds, and a projection night light. This has all!!! I love that it has the option to plug in or use batteries. She is 6 and has figured out the buttons...how to turn on and off and how to set the sound she wants to listen too. I wish I'd found this when they were even younger....we've gone through so many different devices...and I love that this has all that i need in one!
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 30 minutes of receiving the product
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed incredibly cheaply made. We plugged it in downstairs to make sure it worked and it was fine. We unplugged it, walked it upstairs to my daughter's room and it no longer worked. It seems incredibly cheaply made. Also, you can't replace the light bulbs once burnt out. The clock is backlit and you can only see the numbers at night by hitting a button to light it up and the numbers are super tiny. We were hoping to use this a clock for my daughter with the clock on her dresser. She was not able to see the time from her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son who just turned 6 absolutely loves this clock ...
customer_reviews.text: My son who just turned 6 absolutely loves this clock. He started finally to sleep through the night once he got the clock. The sounds are very soothing and you can control the volume. It doesn't come with a electric plug but we connected the USB cord to one and it works perfectly from the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Anya and Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sound machine & lights turn off after a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great, until a week passed. Besides the sound shutting off at random times thoughout the night, the alarm just randomly goes off too. The alarm is not set on the clock and it’s always at a different time. The star lights just randomly go off too. My 3 year old wakes up numerous times and last night it was unplugged and taken out of her room. I need to contact the company I guess
customer_reviews.author: Joan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I expected to have a cord that would actually plug into the wall. But I have to purchase an adapter to even use it, also the cord that came with it is so short that it won't even reach up to my daughter's nightstand let alone her dresser. It does project nicely onto the ceiling. But for $40+, an adapter should have came with it. So now $40 on the light and another purchase for an adapter and longer power cord. Not really worth it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brownbee123

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: The white noise sound works perfectly and the my kids love the little light show. All of their friends have loved it too. The light can be bright right next to the bed, but I put a small book next to it in order to dim it. I wish I could lock in the sound setting that we prefer so that I wouldn't have to set it every night but that's really not a big deal. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. The night light lights up the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the hardest time finding a white noise machine for my children that has all the sounds and an adequate night light on it. This is an awesome product. The night light lights up the whole ceiling in the room, the volume control knob is a nice feature and I love that it plugs in not battery operated. I could do without the clock portion but I'm sure some people like that, and I also would prefer a longer cord then it has but other then that I'm very impressed and would recommend this product to other parents
customer_reviews.author: Mary @ Lyndhurst

customer_reviews.title: Love this sleep gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant! I have a 4 month old and while the star projections are too light for all-night use, I do use them to start her bedtime routine.. When she's older I imagine they'll be used more overnight. The sounds are brilliant. This is the second white noise machine I've used (the first I returned). The galaxy clock is much better, with option of heartbeat... Which would be great for a newborn. Also various nature sounds. Love this product and so happy I paid the premium for this. Removing a star as I feel the light projection could be more subtle.. Less bright.. While you can lock on the darkest colour (red), it is still quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McC

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and all the sound choices. Lots of buttons to control different aspects, BUT not a fan of how the alarm works. The alarm sounds to whatever noise you have it set on which isn't enough to wake my daughter, or anyone else in my house since they're all soothing sounds like birds chirping and a babbling brook and if they go to sleep with the noises on, the alarm doesn't sound at all since that is the noise it would use and its already on. She just uses it as a sound machine and night light.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Miner

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you’d want for your child to have but if only could last longer
customer_reviews.text: I love the selection of sounds, light show, and that it also shows the temperature of the room. My only complaint is that the sound machine and light show will just randomly turn off towards the end of its life, even with it plugged in and on the “nonstop” play setting. I’m on my third one.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome so far!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 5 year old twin girls who share a room. One snores so the other one can’t fall asleep. I needed a white noise machine and found this. It’s perfect! It has a clock/alarm clock that wakes them up for school, a star projector, and numerous sounds. The first night I got it, my girls went to sleep faster than ever!! Loooove it!
customer_reviews.author: g2g

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my granddaughters. They have them at home and have used them for years. I duplicated them here at our home to make an overnight visit transition easier. The girls slept like logs as the Galaxy Clocks were exactly what they are accustomed to. I highly reccommend them; they can chose their sound, lights...everything they enjoy fora peaceful night.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is obsolete & waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a complete waste of $50!! Do not buy it! Yeah it works great for the first month, then it just doesn't turn back on, not to mention the usb cord is a few inches long and does not come with a wall charger...because that makes a lot of sense! I have contacted the seller on several occasions, signed up for their "one year product registration" and received NOTHING from them. Disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Wont work plugged in!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. So disappointed in so many of my Amazon purchases lately. This sounded like a great product; alarm clock, the stars, the soothing sounds... but yoi can only use batteries. Once you plug it in and shuts down and will not turn on. It will only run on batteries and they run out FAST. That's going to get expensive and be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleH

customer_reviews.title: Not an alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to act as a sound machine and alarm for my son. The alarm does not work if the sound machine is on. You can’t chose an alarm sound different from what the sound machine noise is. It’s also rather quiet. The light show feature is nice and the sounds are soothing but it can’t be used as an alarm.
customer_reviews.author: JGoydich

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: When we trun on the star projector I felt it’s too bright and also the soothing music is not so good my lil one sleeps only after I turn off the music. One good thing is it can be connected to other devices using aux. but if I have to use my phone for soothing music what is the point in buying this. It’s made of very cheap plastic. Even though it has alarm clock , soothing music , heartbeat (NOICE) color changing star projection , aux cable it’s still not worth buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A simple product for a simple need.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described. The many different features of this are great. We do primarily use it for the stars and nightlight, but the alarm and clock also come in handy for my children. It is easy enough for them to press the button one more time for more light and it will automatically turn off after a set period.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Schwab

customer_reviews.title: All the extra features ----
customer_reviews.text: Since this was a gift for my granddaughter, I can only tell you that this is the clock she wanted. I enjoyed the smile on my granddaughter's face when she opened this Christmas present and heard her Dad state: "thank goodness for this gift--it will replace the awful sounds from the one she has now".
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Little

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Clock
customer_reviews.text: The stars lighting up is cool! My teen is afraid of the dark and always was keeping her light on; now she has the galaxy clock and the stars are enough light and don't use as much energy. The alarm clock works well also. My only critique is that the sounds, even with the volume turned all the way up, are not very audible. You can hear them, but you have to be right next to it to hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Sweaney

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special here but kinda fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't come with a usb power plug for the wall and the cord provided to plug it in is very short. You can just plug it in with a phone charger so it's not a big deal, but seriously... could we get a longer cord and plug in? Come on. The stars projected are neat, but when flashing from green and blue to red and back it get's darker and lighter in the room so it seems to wake baby up. It's ok. Nothing special here but kinda fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this clock!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has the nature sounds and the temperature. The lights are pretty bright for a nightlight... wish there was a brightness control. Besides that, it's a great clock for a 10-year old. I do hope the bulb lasts, because I don't think it is replaceable, which is too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 2! I had the most difficult time finding a product that would play all night with no cut off. And then when I would find one, it would either only play the sound or lights all night; not both. This product gives you the option to cut off after a certain time or leave on all night and separates the choices for the sound and lights so you can cut off one and leave the other on. I would recommend this product to any parent who's young child struggles to fall or stay asleep because of outside distractions or fear of the dark
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it and it has made my mornings soooooo much smoother
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a regular alarm clock to help my boys (7yo and 8yo) wake up for school and it was the typical harsh alarm tone. I would wake up to my boys laying bed yelling at each other to be the one to turn it off. We basically started every day angry. I decided to find an alarm clock with a better tone. My boys LOVE this new alarm clock, the star projections are fun and soothing, and they take turns deciding which sound they are going to wake up to the next day. I definitely recommend this alarm clock for young children (or anyone, really)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Feb 4
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered February 4th. Started using that day. It’s only been one week (feb 11) and the sound started turning off in the middle of the night even though it was set not to. We love the light it projects but pretty disappointed about the sound.
customer_reviews.author: tmabrams

customer_reviews.title: Night light magic
customer_reviews.text: My Grand daughter is 4 1/2 years old and started having trouble sleeping in her room. This night light got her back on track after a few months of her going to sleep with her Mommy every night. It provided just the right amount of light to make her feel safe. Great product and is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: janice jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler's bedroom. The clock is very lightweight, kinda cheap feeling, but it works great. I love that the lights & sounds stay on all night. I used to have a separate sound machine & nightlight, but this does both in addition to being a clock/alarm clock. Edit: The nightlight stopped working after 1 year. Even with new batteries & power cord it wouldnt work so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: AmberLynne

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!! I bought 3
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this sound machine projector so much that we have bought 3 over the last year (one for each child). The rotation of the lights and variety of sleep sounds are great. It is also a device they can grown with as it has an alarm clock option and additional features. Furthermore I have had to work with the company with a prior purchase due to a defect in one of the machines...and they were AWESOME to work with. Very polite and prompt to address concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set it up.. good  concept.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept.. but needs improvements.. as alarm clock it is kind a difficult for a kid to turn the alarm off.. needs a bigger push buttons.. I like it because can be connect to an outlet and also works with batteries incase you lose power. The light works good it can be adjusted . I just set it up tonight.. lets see for how long the lights will last.. I will keep update.
customer_reviews.author: EyRuAg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As described. The projection could be a little brighter but it works fine, all the same. I love all the features on this product! It will be perfect for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock/noisemaker
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to each of my grandsons who are 6, 8 and 8. They LOVE the nightlight feature that shows on the ceiling and the noisemaker function. One of the 8 year olds is on the spectrum and recently moved into his own room. He doesn’t sleep very well but the first night he had this he slept a full 8 hours. In his words...this clock is AMAZING! If you’re looking for a clock/nightlight/noise maker this is the ONE!
customer_reviews.author: karens27

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Kids! Wish I bought one for myself!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew so I didn’t wake him up when I teach online in the early morning hours and to eliminate the need for a bathroom nightlight. He loves it! Won’t go to sleep without it! My only complaint is that you can’t go to sleep to the sound and have the alarm set. The alarm and the sound machine are the same. It’s one or the other. Very pretty stars and great sleep settings for the nice variety of sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Porter

customer_reviews.title: Serves the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I had another star projector clock and realized I had to change the batteries every few days. So I started looking for one that could be plugged into a power source and found this one with pretty good reviews. I like everything about this clock so far with two exceptions: First the power cord is too short Secondly, the stars that project on the walls do not look real. Although my 5-year -old likes them the way they are, I feel they are too large and too colorful. I would had preferred more subtle ones like what you see in the sky at night.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful relaxing stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves the stars. I haven't figured out how connect it to have it play nursery rhymes but she likes the heartbeat and the birds. I love the fact that it works for her now as a toddler and it will grow with her. Eventually she'll be able to use the clock and the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Pollock

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2 on this item!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item, it broke, we returned it and replaced with the same item, because we liked it so much when it was working. We thought maybe we just got a bad apple. Nope, got the other one and broke again in 4 days. Lights and sound stopped working randomly on both of them. Chance of receiving two bad apples......zero.
customer_reviews.author: Nate N.

customer_reviews.title: Finally. Very happy with this star-projecting clock
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic find. A bit pricier than I was hoping for, but love that it actually plugs in, has battery back up, and beautifully illuminates my daughter's room in stars. Soft soothing noises are a joy to her. I really like that the colors can be stopped from changing, and can choose to have the lights turn off after 30 or 60 minutes – depending on what I choose. Thank you! Only change I would make would be to have the actual time illuminated as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but then...letdown.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the sounds and lights but after only a couple of months the sound stopped working. I tried reaching out to customer service but never heard back. This product was a let down and I would NOT recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: It’s a night light, sound machine, alarm clock all in 1!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baughman

customer_reviews.title: A simple white noise machine would make me just as happy and I would pay half as much
customer_reviews.text: The womb simulator is not soothing. It sounds very electronic. I wish there was a white noise option. Cycling through the sounds you will find a phone ringing and other absurd sounds before getting to the more natural ones.I have had to turn the machine on while my kids are sleeping and that noise is intense! The birds are annoyingly loud too. My son loves the Stars but I worry about them burning out. We use the ocean noise mostly since it is closest to white noise. A simple white noise machine would make me just as happy and I would pay half as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter. The first one did not work at all with the plug which is one of the reasons we went with this machine. My other daughter has a similar one but it is battery operated only. The batteries just get expensive. We returned the first one for a replacement and the second one worked for 2 days before it stopped working with the cord as well. It worked with the batteries, but I didn't want one that was battery operated. I returned this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional Alarm Clock
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this clock! It's not just an alarm clock, but also a star projector and sound machine. The clock has a cord plug which is much better than other similar clocks I looked at that just used batteries. I would hate to have to constantly buy batteries, so I'm glad I took the time to read reviews before purchasing other clocks. It was shipped quickly and in great condition when it arrived. It helps keep my kids in their own bed which is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Khan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my son for Christmas. He was so excited...until we went to use it and it automatically shut off after 2 minutes (light and sound) so I just thought I happened to get a defective one...no big deal I will have them replace it with a new one. Got the new one yesterday and the volume knob does not work... It's so loud with no way to adjust it. Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love the star display. Love that it has a clock too. Only cons (in my opinion): White noise could be a little louder. Also, not a fan of the buttons being on the front AND back; Would prefer them to all be on the front for easier access. Overall, pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this clock/sound machine for our grand daughter. She was disappointed with our original purchase from a local store because we skimped on the price...it only lasted about 2 weeks before breaking. This one costs a bit more, but she loves it...the quality is easy to recognize and she is so excited about the stars that actually change color!!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact multifunction machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice small size, star images are nice and soothing to watch. The white noise has some good options, but I wish the alarm sounds were controlled by a different button. I’m just waiting for the night when I accidentally turn on a shrieking alarm and wake the baby up out of a dead sleep. Also the white noise and projector buttons should be on the front and the clock controls on the back, since it’s the former I use every night. These are minor details, though. Overall a great little machine and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This item replaced a previous sound machine. The child loves the choices of sounds. Right now rain is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has trouble sleeping so this is a blessing plus it has an alarm clock for school
customer_reviews.author: schutrop

customer_reviews.title: I am highly disappointed in this product especially given the price
customer_reviews.text: I am highly disappointed in this product especially given the price. I purchased this item after doing a fair amount of research on sound machines for children and wanted one with both lights as well as a variety of sound selections. I ordered this product on October 23, 2016 and as of March 15, 2017 less than 6 months later, the sound no longer works at all. We have tried everything and there is no fixing it. The product was never exposed to water or damaged it just stopped. If I knew I was going to have to buy a replacement so soon I would have spent less on the first model.
customer_reviews.author: CDD

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but has as big as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very neat, but not as big as I was expecting. This is pretty small and must be kept on a dresser/nightstand in order to actually have the stars reach the ceiling. We put it close to a wall and the stars show up well along the wall, but do not reach the ceiling as we originally hoped. My son still enjoys it though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing! This was so small and cheaply made ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing! This was so small and cheaply made. The stars shine straight up so unless you keep it on a table in the middle of the room, they shine on the wall instead of the ceiling. We returned this items
customer_reviews.author: STACIE HAYNES

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to fall asleep to the lights and sounds! And I LOVE that this can be plugged in and doesn't have run off batteries!
customer_reviews.author: J R Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied with this product! My 2yr old grandson loves the nature sounds and star projections. I love that it tells me the temp in his room and has a timer for automatic shut off. This has made bedtime so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only been 3 days and already broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nice star projection night light and sound machine. However that’s about the only redeeming quality. It’s day 3 and it’s already broken. The display will only show “60” which popped up when I pressed “Temp”(that is the wrong temperature). It will no longer respond to show Time, or Alarm. No amount of switching off then on has helped. There is also no reset button. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We bought this for our 4 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We bought this for our 4 year old and she loves it. We tried a few other similar first, but they were battery powered. The batteries only lasted a few days and we got tired of changing them out. This is one of the few that we found that can be plugged in and it makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my niece. She loves it! It is now part of her bedtime routine, she even tries to play with it during the day, trying to project stars onto people and things. Some of the soothing sounds I personally don't find soothing, but that is simply an opinion and there are other great sounds. I also really like that you can play your own music with this. Definitely a great choice for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: tmwest

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Kids will love the pretty and changing colored ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Kids will love the pretty and changing colored stars it puts on the ceiling with no mechanical noise. I did have to exchange it for a second one as the first stopped working after 3 weeks, but that was easy with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Audiorich

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our baby's room
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our baby's room!! We use the white noise setting- before the noise she only slept 3-4 hours in a row and now she sleeps 12-14 hours and she's only 3 months old! It's just loud enough and it doesn't take up a lot of room on her dresser. She is also a big fan of the lights that are projected on the walls. I would totally buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kay

customer_reviews.title: This made such a difference with my newborn and getting ...
customer_reviews.text: This made such a difference with my newborn and getting her to fall asleep. The only downside is the clock isn't lit up, so you can't see the time in the middle of the night. There's a button that turns the light on, but it only lasts for a few seconds. My other minor complaint is how short the cable is that comes with it. More perks than downsides over all, though.
customer_reviews.author: BrittD

customer_reviews.title: Nonstop feature doesn't always mean nonstop.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. The "nonstop" light and noise feature stopped after about an hour. We were told it was going to run all night in that mode.. Was told the unit was defective. Will make a nice alarm clock when our little guy gets a little older, but for now, it's just going to sit in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Orrin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one for myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for the grandkids. They love it and take turns being the one to select the sound. I liked it enough that I bought one for grandpa and me. :) We haven't used the alarm, just the light and sound. The different colored stars fade in and out and create a peaceful environment to fall asleep in.
customer_reviews.author: SDT

customer_reviews.title: Soothing night light
customer_reviews.text: This is the third clock we have purchased. My toddler loves it and we use it every night. We mainly use the star nightlight feature - he loves watching it change colors as he falls asleep. We have one in his room and one at grandma’s house (and one we travel with).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cord too short
customer_reviews.text: What is up with the cord?? It is so short, barely reaches the wall sockets. It's literally like 8 inches long. USB port only. Also, I hate that the alarm sound is same sound as what you choose to go to sleep with. My son likes the water sound but when the alarm turns on in the morning, you can barely hear it so he wouldn't wake up. Useless as an alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shimomura

customer_reviews.title: Features sounded great with alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Features sounded great with alarm clock, soothing sounds and night stars, but the product fell short on all fronts. The clock kept resetting, the am/pm buttons did not work properly, and the sound stopped working altogether after only 2 nights. We never had a chance to test the alarm because the clock time kept resetting and the time was never correct for my daughters wake up time. The only working feature was the night sky, which was nice; however, even this had flaws as the lock button to hold on a specific color did not work properly. The product was returned after 2 nights.
customer_reviews.author: RRosen

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do love the fact that it will stay on all night. A lot of products don't have that feature. -The lights are awesome but it would be nice to have some control over the brightness. Sometimes it's way too bright for baby. -The sound quality is pretty bad and the volume doesn't get hight enough to really be effective as white noise. -Design is cool, and the size is perfect for small spaces. Overall, for the price it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like that the time doesn’t light up in the dark ...
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing. I don’t like that the time doesn’t light up in the dark for my daughter. To work the alarm is goofy but the projection and sounds are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kehn

customer_reviews.title: Can be plugged or battery operated.
customer_reviews.text: We love the wave sounds & the lights. It’s not too bright but provides a soothing environment. We’ve been using one since my son was a baby & he is 2+ now. We are on our 2nd one but it is because we accidentally put our 1st one in the wash machine—oops. We can’t imagine life without it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Alltop

customer_reviews.title: Price is a little high
customer_reviews.text: Stars are cool, I like the fading effect...makes the dark not so scary since it doesnt last long. I do wish the stars rotated. The kids (18mo & 3yrs) like the water sounds, not much interest in other sounds. If I need another when the kids get separate rooms, I'll try a cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: jussumfun

customer_reviews.title: Great little clock for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great little clock for kids. My girls love it. The changing lights and stars on the wall/ceiling are fun and super relaxing. The light allows you to lock it in a specific color which I do after the girls fall asleep, some of the colors are too bright to go through the night but the red/pink color is a perfect hue. The white noise is pleasant and works for the kids. Overall we are loving the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Cressa

customer_reviews.title: Nonstop function not working
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it when it works but I’ve had for 3 months and the nonstop function doesn’t work anymore. This hinders their sleep because it’s a distraction when it shuts off before they are asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Orth

customer_reviews.title: A decent nightlight and alarm
customer_reviews.text: It is an ok option, but wasn't exactly what I was wanting. It is small, doesn't come with a wall plug (although I think you could plug in the usb cord into a regular phone charger and it would work, I just haven't tried it yet), and the pre loaded "music" doesn't include any soothing nighttime music, which is what I was hoping for. The stars that it projects are awesome tho, and I like the time and alarm features. So, overall it was good, just not exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Hogangirl

customer_reviews.title: Clock cool, seller, not so much
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sound machine because we could plug it in and not burn batteries like the discovery sound/light machine we have. Unfortunately, the galaxy clock came with the wrong plug in cord. I contacted the seller twice with no response. I think the galaxy clock is cool, but I’m very disappointed in the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good kids clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clock for kids my girls love to sleep with the lights i got a usb extender to go with it so i can keep the clock plugged in no relying on batteries. My only problem with it is the time is written very small so you cant use it during the day as it is too small n dim to see the time
customer_reviews.author: jia

customer_reviews.title: Great for infants and children.
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied! My daughter loves it. Would put 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haynes

customer_reviews.title: clock with lights and sound
customer_reviews.text: I like the clock with the sound machines and lights all in one. I have not used the alarm yet. My children thinks it is cool with the changing colors. I would like to have the white noise but there is a variety of sounds to choose from. We are using the rain drops or the ocean sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cooper

customer_reviews.title: The product is junk.
customer_reviews.text: At first the cord would not charge the item. So I returned it, but within a few weeks, it had stopped working again. My kids were upset, so I just picked up something similar at a 2nd hand store and this one sat in the closet because I hated to just throw $30 away. But that is exactly what is going to happen with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful stars fill the room
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nightlight/clock combination for my 9 yr. old. At first glance, I thought it was more for an infant, but my daughter loves it. She loves the colorful stars that envelope her room. I appreciate it has a 30 or 60 min or constant timer for the nightlight. The nature sounds are a bit too amplified, but not dissatisfied enough to return.
customer_reviews.author: PJAJMHome

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES this clock. She can set and change the time and alarms. She likes being able to choose the different sounds too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Makes sleep possible
customer_reviews.text: White noise with the color changing display, puts the kids right to sleep....automatic 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Walsh

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it! It helps her fall asleep at night. The stars are all over her room, not just in one small area like other models. Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This works really great and my daughter loves it as a night light. I wish the cord was a bit longer as it is quiet short. But have had it over a year and it still works as great as the first day we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old turns this on every night before ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old turns this on every night before bed. She likes the stars that shine on the ceiling and we usually pick the "ocean" sound for her to listen to. You can choose for the light and sound to stay on for 30 minutes, 60 minutes, or until you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: john ballard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for children who have trouble sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is perfect for my daughter who is on the autism spectrum and has trouble going to and staying asleep. It is easy to use and has the option to stay on all night. It covers her room with dimly lighted stars that change colors so as not to over stimulate and she chooses a different nature sound each night. It is so relaxing! Just what we've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty82

customer_reviews.title: If you want to sleep, this definitely needs to be a purchase you make!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LoVE this thing. I ordered it when my son was about 2, as he had always slept through the night before, but entered the '2 ur old sleep regression' where he would wake up every night. Being pregnant again, I couldn't continue to get up every night and not get any sleep. So on a whim, I ordered this. It took him a night to get used to it, but he started sleeping through the night again, and I finally got some rest. Definitely worth the few dollars to pay for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the size/price
customer_reviews.text: Great product in a little package. The only draw back is that if you have it turned up to the volume I'd usually use in my sons room it makes a weird intermittent click about every four seconds. Other than that we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K

customer_reviews.title: Turns off randomly during the night (AKA worst problem possible)
customer_reviews.text: Randomly decides to shut off. Literally the worst problem a sound machine could have. Nothing like getting awakened by a screaming toddler in the middle of the night because the sound machine cut off.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock.
customer_reviews.text: We love the clock, even thought the stars don’t rotate it is a perfect lock/ ignite light for my little one. It’s also it huge so does not take up a ton of dresser space and goes off of battery and electric power so no need to spend tons on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

product_meta.title: Galaxy Clock by MomKnows. Soothing Star Projector Sound Machine. Relaxing Night Light With Nature Sounds and White Noise. Kids Baby Ceiling Projection Alarm Clock Lamp
product_meta.description:
Why choose the Stars Ceiling Projector By MomKnows 
High Quality Unique Product Our competitors sell cheap, low quality products that have limited features and use 'junk' components that are prone to defects. We take pride in our manufacturing process and quality control. We are sure that our product is the highest quality available on Amazon. 
Beautiful Star Projections Captivating star projections will transform any room. Helps to relax and assist sleep. 
Soothing Nature Sounds + Womb Simulator Relaxing will sounds put you in a relaxed mood that will help you or your children fall asleep with ease and the alarm clock will ensure you wake up gradually without feeling groggy. Our unique womb simulator feature is scientifically proven to aid in the sleep of infants and young children. 
Music Speaker Play music with a smartphone, iPhone, iPod, Android, computer or with line-in. The auto-shut off function gives you the control to shut off the sound after either 30 min or 60 min (or non-stop). 
Progressive Volume Control Knob No other similar product on the market has this feature. All other products are too loud, which means the benefits of the relaxing nature sounds is lost. 
Perfect As A Gift Our premium and beautiful packaging makes this product a great gift for family and friends. Perfect for Christmas. 
Customer Service All our produced backed by excellent customer service. We are here to serve you. 
Powered by cable (included) or 3AA batteries. Includes instruction manual. 
We are so certain of your satisfaction that we offer a ONE-YEAR 100% money back guarantee! No questions asked! 
Click ADD-TO-CART to order your GalaxyClock Star Projector today RISK-FREE!
feature_bullets: ★ RELAXING STARS PROJECTOR ★ Perfect For Children And Adults. Helps You Or Your Child Get To Sleep. Can Be Used Instead Of A Night Light For Children Scared Of The Dark. Cycle Between Several Colors Or Fix On A Single Color. Soothing And Mesmerizing.

★ 7 CALMING NATURE AND WHITE NOISE SOUNDS ★ Relaxes And Soothes The Mind. Including Birds, Brooks, Rainforest, Waves in Beach, Brooks & Birds and Rain. PLUS Womb Simulator Feature Which Is Scientifically Proven to Assist Infants And Young Children Fall Asleep.

★ HIGH QUALITY AUDIO WITH VOLUME CONTROL★ Enjoy Your Own Music With Our High Quality Music Speaker. Works With iPhone, iPod, Android, MP3, Computer, Line-In. Unlike Other Brands, Our Clock Has a Volume Control Knob So You Can Set Your Preferred Volume. Auto-Shut Off Function (30/Min, 60/Min, Non-Stop) Puts the Control Back in Your Hands.

★ ALARM CLOCK & TEMPERATURE MONITOR ★ Not Your Everyday Stars Projector! Wake-Up Naturally And Gradually With The Alarm Clock Feature (Use With Nature Sound Or Regular Alarm) And Check The Temperature With The Press Of a Single Button.
★ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ★ If you are not completely satisfied, we will give your money back NO QUESTIONS ASKED!
